item.title: Missing Tombstones
item.description: About Star This plugin will allow you to view persons which deceased in the past 30 years not having an image of the type tombstone/headstone. Installation Further Reading Github: bmhm/webtrees-missingtombstones. On my homepage (de): Webtrees-Modul: Fehlende Grabsteine. On my homepage (en): Webtrees-Module: Missing Tombstones. Webtrees Forums: Webtrees: Missing Tombstones.

item.title: Repo: Webtrees
item.description: Plugin “Missing Tombstones Missing Tombstones Plugin “JSON LD” JSON LD

item.title: Repo: Hibiscus
item.description: Hibiscus Repositories How to set up Go to the Menu File -> Settings. Chose the Tab Plugins. Add the following site. https://bmhm.github.io/repositories/hibiscus Plugins hibiscus.ffb.depot (Github) Plugin, which uses the ffb.depot.client library to implement FFB Balance. See below for library details. Libraries ffb.depot.client (Github) Jax-RS 2.0 Library, which can authenticate a user and parses data from the fidelity.de page to access ones funds depot. slf4j-jameica (Github)
